benchmark_details.name: FinTMMBench
benchmark_details.overview: FinTMMBench is the first comprehensive benchmark for evaluating temporal-aware multi-modal Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems in finance, comprising 5,676 questions spanning financial tables, news articles, daily stock prices, and visual technical charts, designed to assess a model's ability to retrieve and reason over temporal financial information.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate temporal-aware multi-modal Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) systems in finance.

data.source: Financial data of NASDAQ-100 companies from various modalities including financial tables, news articles, daily stock prices, and visual technical charts.
data.annotation: Automatically generated from templates with human review for quality assurance.

methodology.calculation: EM, F1 Score, and Accuracy against ground-truth answers.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better retrieval and reasoning performance.
methodology.baseline_results: F1 score of 31.41 with the proposed TMMHybridRAG method.
methodology.validation: Iterative process combining automatic revision and human review to ensure a verification accuracy exceeding 85%.
